story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of China, there lived a young boy named Li Wei. Li Wei lived in a small village surrounded by lush green mountains and winding rivers that sparkled in the sunlight.

Every night before Li Wei went to bed, his mother would tell him stories about the legendary dragons that roamed the skies and the brave warriors who fought to protect their people. The stories would fill Li Wei's dreams with adventure and magic.

One night, as Li Wei lay in bed with his eyes heavy from a long day of play, his mother told him a special story about a young dragon who had lost his way.

The dragon, named Ming, had strayed from his family and found himself lost in a dark and unfamiliar forest. Ming was scared and lonely, unsure of how to find his way back home.

As the story unfolded, Li Wei imagined himself as the brave warrior who set out to help the lost dragon. Together, they journeyed through the forest, facing many challenges and making new friends along the way.

With each twist and turn in the story, Li Wei felt a sense of courage and determination growing within him. He realized that even in the face of fear and uncertainty, with the help of friends and family, he could overcome any obstacle.

As Li Wei's eyes closed in peaceful sleep, he felt the warmth of his mother's love wrapping around him, just like the dragon Ming had found his way back home with the help of his new friends.

And so, in the quiet of the night, under the watchful eyes of the stars, Li Wei drifted off to sleep, dreaming of adventure, magic, and the boundless possibilities that awaited him in the morning.

Goodnight, Li Wei. May your dreams be filled with dragons and warriors, and may you always remember that courage and friendship will guide you home. 

The End.
